TopicTitle: How To... Drive a Truck into the VAB

Articles.Content:
My first attempt at a comedy-style KSP video. Quite simply, I'm challenged to create a truck with rover parts, and get it into the VAB.
How hard can it be?

No thoughts or feedback?

Too long. Too stereotypic music. And crashing different versions of one truck isn't that awesome.

TLDR; boring to watch.

Before everybody makes an "omg u sux cuz u make no vids and u don't know anything" here's my channel

https://www.youtube.com/user/EvilotionCR2

Edited May 10, 2014 by EvilotionCR2

Too long. Too stereotypic music. And crashing different versions of one truck isn't that awesome.

TLDR; boring to watch.

[shnip]

This isn't boring! It's actually quite well made. The OP took a good long time making this, and I think that it was worth the effort.

That being said: Your set of songs is, indeed, overused. You may want to find some new music if you want to continue these.

Please don't let EvilotionCR2 ruin your fun. I think it's good, and I have ~6x the YouTube subs that he does, so clearly I'm not new to these sorts of things. You're good at this already, and you'll only improve the more you try.
Cool and fun to watch but my only crit is that its a bit long
